Sql.Text: WITH BOM(CHMCD,PHMCD,LEVEL) as( SELECT MPCHNC,MPPHNC,1 FROM MMPRSEP WHERE MPPHNC LIKE ? || '%' AND MPCHTP IN ('03','08','04') AND MPPHTP = '01' UNION ALL SELECT MPCHNC,MPPHNC,LEVEL+1 FROM MMPRSEP INNER JOIN BOM ON MPPHNC = CHMCD WHERE MPCHTP IN ('03','08','04') ) SELECT ZHHMC6 MPN,ZHEITM FullItemCode,LEVEL,ZHEKOT ProcessCode,ZHTJYN+0 ProcessNo,SUM(ZHOQTY) Quantity,(SELECT MAX(MIKODO) MIKODO FROM MMITEMP WHERE MIDHCD LIKE ZHHMC6 || '%') Koto, SUM(CASE ZIOPTI WHEN '1' THEN ZHOQTY ELSE 0 END) Onhold FROM MZSODRP INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT LEFT(CHMCD,6)||'%'||RIGHT(CHMCD,4) CHMCD,MIN(LEVEL) LEVEL FROM BOM GROUP BY CHMCD) BOM ON ZHEITM LIKE CHMCD LEFT JOIN MZILOTP ON ZHSZNO = ZISZNO AND ZHLTNO = ZILTNO AND ZIOPTI = '1' WHERE ZHSTC2 = 1 AND ZHHMTP <> '07' GROUP BY ZHHMC6,ZHEITM,ZHEKOT,ZHTJYN,LEVEL
SELECT MILTSZ, MIKODO FROM MMITEMP WHERE MIHMCD LIKE ? || '%' AND MITYPE ='01' ORDER BY MIETDT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
select * from WMProcess where RootPath like @MPN + '%;' + @HMCD + '%'
delete from WMProcess where RootPath like @RootPath+'/%' or RootPath = @RootPath
select * from WMProject where (CustProject = @CustProject or @CustProject = 'ALL') and (MPN = @MPN or @MPN = 'ALL')
select * from WMIOData where (Project+FlexName = @Project or @Project = 'ALL') and (PlanDate >= @PlanDateFrom or @PlanDateFrom is null) and (PlanDate <= @PlanDateTo or @PlanDateTo is null)
delete from WMIOData where PlanDate >= @PlanDate and Project = @Project and FlexName = @FlexName
SELECT DISTINCT MPN FROM WMProcess ORDER BY MPN
SELECT DISTINCT MPN FROM WMProject ORDER BY MPN

WITH BOM(SEQN,TEJN,CHMCD,PHMCD,LEVEL,RootPath,MPN,IsEnd) as( SELECT MPSEQN,MPTEJN,MPCHNC,MPPHNC,1,cast(MPPHNC||';'||MPCHNC as varchar(1000)),LEFT(MPPHNC,6),(SELECT 0 FROM MMPRSEP B WHERE B.MPPHNC = A.MPCHNC AND B.MPCHTP IN ('03','08','04') FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) FROM MMPRSEP A WHERE MPPHNC LIKE ? || '%' AND MPCHTP IN ('03','08','04') AND MPPHTP = '01' AND MPCHNC LIKE ? || '%' UNION ALL SELECT MPSEQN,MPTEJN,MPCHNC,MPPHNC,LEVEL+1,RootPath||';'||MPCHNC,MPN,(SELECT 0 FROM MMPRSEP B WHERE B.MPPHNC = A.MPCHNC AND B.MPCHTP IN ('03','08','04') FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) FROM MMPRSEP A INNER JOIN BOM ON MPPHNC = CHMCD WHERE MPCHTP IN ('03','08','04') ) SELECT MPN, CHMCD ItemCode,LEVEL,case MJNOKT when '' then '0' else MJNOKT end ProcessNo, MJTJKT ProcessCode, EBNAME Description,trim(RootPath)||'/'||TEJN||RIGHT('0000'||SEQN,4) RootPath, CASE WHEN isEnd IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END IsEnd FROM BOM a INNER JOIN MMKTJEP ON CHMCD = MJHNCD INNER JOIN EBTTBGP ON EBCODE = MJTJKT

WITH BOM(CHMCD,PHMCD,LEVEL) as( SELECT MPCHNC,MPPHNC,1 FROM MMPRSEP WHERE MPPHNC LIKE ?||'%' AND MPCHTP IN ('03','08','04') AND MPPHTP = '01' UNION ALL SELECT MPCHNC,MPPHNC,LEVEL+1 FROM MMPRSEP INNER JOIN BOM ON MPPHNC = CHMCD WHERE MPCHTP IN ('03','08','04') ) SELECT SUM(BRYUKS) BRYUKS FROM MZBROLP LEFT JOIN MMITEMP ON MIHMCD = BRZAIR WHERE BRZAIR LIKE (SELECT LEFT(CHMCD,6)||'%'||RIGHT(CHMCD,4) FROM BOM WHERE LEVEL=2 ORDER BY PHMCD DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY)||'%' AND BREFLG =''
SELECT SUM(ZFZQTY) FROM MZPZAFP WHERE ZFHMCD LIKE ?||'%' AND ZFBASY ='1'
SELECT * FROM MMCALMP WHERE MBBMNC='0000' AND MBDATE BETWEEN ? AND ?
